sentences.en: An autopsy eventually ascribed the baby's death to sudden infant death syndrome.
sentences.cn: 一次尸检最终把这名婴儿的死亡归因于婴儿猝死综合症。

sentences.en: Ascribe to the LORD , O families of nations, ascribe to the LORD glory and strength.
sentences.cn: 民中的万族阿,你们要将荣耀能力归给耶和华, 都归给耶和华.

sentences.en: Ascribe to the Lord , O mighty ones, ascribe to the Lord glory and strength.
sentences.cn: 1上帝的众子啊, 你们要将荣耀、能力归给耶和华, 归给耶和华!

sentences.en: Ascribe to the LORD, O mighty ones , ascribe to the LORD glory and strength.
sentences.cn: 神的众子阿, 你们要将荣耀能力, 归给耶和华. 归给耶和华.

sentences.en: Does the bible in the least ascribe the origin of evil to god?
sentences.cn: 圣经把罪恶的根源多少也归咎于上帝 吗 ?

sentences.en: For I proclaim the name of the Lord ; Ascribe greatness to our God!
sentences.cn: 申32:3我要宣告耶和华的名.们要将大德归与我们的神.

sentences.en: He ascribed his failure to bad luck.
sentences.cn: 他认为自己的失败是运气不好。

sentences.en: I ascribe his conduct to insanity.
sentences.cn: 我认为他的行为是颠狂所致.

sentences.en: I would not ascribe vice to him.
sentences.cn: 我不愿意把罪过归给他.

sentences.en: I'd beery reluctant to ascribe this purely to heading author Dr.
sentences.cn: 把造成这种情形的原因完全归于头部的撞击似乎有些勉强.

sentences.en: It's wrong to ascribe all that have happened simply to the war.
sentences.cn: 把发生的一切归咎于战争是错误的.

sentences.en: Never ascribe to an opponent motive mean than your own.
sentences.cn: 切勿把比自己的更下流的动机说成是对手的.

sentences.en: Scholars ascribe the unsigned painting to Rubens.
sentences.cn: 学者们认为这幅无落款的画的作者是鲁本斯.

sentences.en: The report ascribes the rise in childhood asthma to the increase in pollution.
sentences.cn: 这份报告认为儿童哮喘发病率上升是因为污染加剧。

sentences.en: To ascribe opinions retrospectively is of course very dangerous.
sentences.cn: 事后再翻出当初谁说了什么当然是很危险的。

sentences.en: To what do you ascribe this growth and has it had down sides?
sentences.cn: 你将它的成长归于什么正面因素?你觉得还有什么消极因素?

sentences.en: When studying Macbeth, people usually ascribe to the external environment, human factors even uncontrollable destiny.
sentences.cn: 人们在研究《麦克白》时, 一般将麦克白悲剧归结于外在环境 、 人为因素甚或不可驾驭的命运.

sentences.en: You can't ascribe the same meaning to both words.
sentences.cn: 不要认为这两个词的意思是相同的.

trans.tran_en: to claim that something is caused by a particular person, situation etc

trans.tran_cn: 把…归因于， 把…归属于
trans.tran_en: If you ascribe an event or condition to a particular cause, you say or consider that it was caused by that thing
